downloadTitle: Guide for IT Pros for Microsoft Office Web Apps Beta
downloadDescription: Provides information to help IT pros understand an Office Web Apps on-premises solution.
detailsSection: This document supports a preliminary release of Microsoft Office 2010 Beta. The content in the book covers information about how to understand and use Microsoft Office Web Apps Beta.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
